subtitles_text: JEFF PROBST:  16 Americans forced to abandon ship
in the middle of the South China Sea.
they must work together    to build shelter,
find food and survive the island.
But ultimately, it is    everyone for themselves.
Every third night, they will    hike deep into the jungle
to take part  in the Tribal Council
where they must vote one  of their own off the island.
In the end, only one will remain
